summary: Ichi is a blind woman who roams about town with her shamisen (a three-stringed Japanese guitar), but she has exceptional sword skills with which she fights off yakuza and other villains.
cast: Haruka Ayase|Shidô Nakamura|Yôsuke Kubozuka|Takao Osawa|Gô Rijû|Mayumi Sada|Tetsuo Yamashita|Ayumu Saitô|Tôru Tezuka|Kumiko Tsuchiya|Shirô Namiki|Tetta Sugimoto|Megumi Yokoyama|Eri Watanabe|Yoshiyuki Yamaguchi|Akira Emoto|Yûto Nakano|Shôichirô Masumoto|Ryôsuke Shima|Katsuya|Kôji Motegi|Yuuki Natsusaka|Kotarô Tomomitsu|Kôichi Taniguchi|Kenji Yoshioka|Issei Okihara|Yasuomi Sano|Mickey Koga|Ryûki Kitaoka|Tadashi Oiwa|Usagi Kôno|Yukina Kashiwa|Kazuma Chiba|Wakako Matsuzaka|Reita Serizawa|Toshiki Masuda|Masaki Katô|Yûko Endô|Daishirô Hano|Horiken|Yoshihiro Ishizuka|Eiko Kotake|Hiroki Matsukata|Masaaki Nagae|Riki Takeuchi|R. Bruce Elliott|Todd Haberkorn|Gwendolyn Lau|Andy Mullins|Brina Palencia|Brandon Potter|Christopher Sabat|J. Michael Tatum|Kent Williams
title: Ichi
